infos.value: Loreila, chief of Gouga. Skahal, chief of Saiga.
The two, in love, moved to unite their feuding villages.
Alas...
Their plan was met with opposition from their shinobi, and Loreila was slain.
Having lost the woman to whom he promised his future, Skahal swore to destroy Gouga.
Thus, the two villages plunged into all-out war.
What happened here!?
Ahlim. Are you unharmed?
I'm fine. It's a relief to see you safe, Lord Skahal.
Is this...Gouga's doing?
Without a doubt.
...Who goes there!?
I've finally found you, Skahal.
How dare you speak to Lord Skahal that way! Identify yourself!
Would knowing give you peace in the afterlife?
Then I'll tell you. I am Niv'Lu.
And as you may have guessed, I'm an assassin from Gouga.
If you want Lord Skahal, you'll have to get through me first!
...Get out of my sight. I've no interest in weaklings.
Weaklings!?
Gouga shinobi! And in such number...!
This will be the end of Saiga.
Not while I'm around!
K-Kitone!
I wish I could have been here sooner. I heard the village was in danger...
Hmph. Why are you here?
Lynx...!
You'll only get in my way. I alone am more than enough to handle them.
We haven't seen each other in so long. Why are you so...?
Do you not understand?
Understand what...?
We belong to different kingdoms. For all we know, we may be enemies on the morrow.
Perhaps. But Leonis and Hourne...
We can talk later.
Right now, we must protect Saiga!
